text: Dobs at the Shore is a 1914 American silent comedy film featuring Oliver Hardy. ==Cast== * Frank Griffin - Jemula Heckla (as Frank C. Griffin) * Oliver Hardy - Meggie Heckla (as Babe Hardy) * Frances Ne Moyer - Helen Martin * Raymond McKee - Count Casco * Don Ferrando - Bob Fisher ==See also== * List of American films of 1914 * Oliver Hardy filmography ==External links== * Category:1914 films Category:American silent short films Category:American films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1914 comedy films Category:1914 short films Category:Films directed by Frank Griffin Category:American comedy films Category:Comedy short films
title: Dobs at the Shore
